title: "unspecified error occurred" LoL client broken?
body: As a first few attempts to login the client tells me my password is wrong, then attempts to update and keeps reiterating "unspecified error occurred" and tries to roll back to a previous installation. This doesn't work either and is stuck in a ring of errors. I know my password is right because I was able to login to my girlfriends computer with her client perfectly fine and updated, but mine is not working (both on windows 10) I have uninstalled league and reinstalled it to no avail - infact now it won't even reinstall because the errors come with it. Please help or send out a fix as this seems like it's happening to a lot of people.

replies.body: It sounds like your connection might be unstable and failing to connect to the patching servers, so it can't get you to the current patch.  Rule out some possibilities by going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Give it another go once complete, and let me know if you run into any issues.
